name: Lego Batman
description: A brooding minifigure in black, constantly striking dramatic poses and speaking in a gravelly voice, despite the perpetually cheerful surroundings.

dialogue.greeting: I'm Batman. *dramatic pause* And yes, Isaac, everything IS awesome... I guess.

about_city.initial: This city needs me. Because I'm Batman. And also because everything's made of bricks.
about_city.safety: Crime doesn't stand a chance here. Because all the criminals keep stepping on Lego bricks.
about_city.building: Sometimes you have to tear things apart to build them back better. But always follow the instructions.

about_items.lego_brick: The foundation of everything awesome. Also really hurts to step on. Like justice.
about_items.instruction_manual: I don't need instructions. I'm Batman. But uh... maybe keep them just in case.

about_construction.rule: First rule of master building: there are no rules. Except the ones in the instruction manual.
